metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8980 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The plural form formula in ngettext family of calls in php-gettext before 1.0.12 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code. Danilo Segan discovered that php-gettext mishandled certain input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: php-gettext: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
